<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ability Scores](/Rules.aspx?ID=1583)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 58 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An eidolon's ability scores depend on which array you choose, such as marauding dragon or cunning dragon for a dragon eidolon. As noted in the [summoner's ability boosts class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=18), your eidolon gets boosts to its ability scores at the same time you do. It also increases one score by 2 when it gains its transcendence ability.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
